The history of the civil wars of England from the year 1640-1660 / by T.H. Behemoth Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
[2], 286, [1] p.
[s.n.], [London] printed : 1679.
"Most editions have title: Behemoth, etc. Finished in 1668, work suppressed until surreptitiously published in 1679"--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
